result.execSummary:
All charges against Kristi Melinda David in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kristi Melinda David is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kristi Melinda David

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Kristi Melinda David
Current: 344 Hillside Circle, C/O Kari Henry, Baldwin, WI 54002 United States  (Effective: 02-25-2022)
Prior: 344 Hillside Circle, Baldwin, WI 54002 United States
Added the "on or about" language previously omitted in the probable cause section of the 1st complaint. Filed by ADA Smestad. km

03:58 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, ADA: Brian Thomas Smestad, DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi, DF: Kristi Melinda David appeared. Includes 22CF139 (PH), 22CF141 (WOPH) and 22CF30 (PTC).  ADA Smestad believes there will be a waiver on 22CF141.  Atty Dolfi agrees.  On 22CF139- S/T of Sgt Jacob Sather NRPD.  Direct by ADA Smestad.  ADA Smestad asks Court to take Judicial Notice of bail bond on 22CF30.  Court takes Judicial Notice. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Court questions witness. Atty arguments. Court at this time is going to dismiss 22CF139.   On 22CF141- Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial.  Court notes DE has missed some testing at JSC and questions DE as to why she's been missing. Testing will continue and court notes DE's positive test results.  ADA Smestad states DE has matters pending in Branch IV, depending on driving case, Court approves Branch IV to take these matters if needed.  Adjourned 4:20 PM. bph  Arraignment scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Filed by Atty Dolfi. arc   e: DA
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Appointing Atty Dolfi. Filed by Atty Satorius. arc

ADDRESS INFO for Kristi Melinda David
Current: 344 Hillside Circle, Baldwin, WI 54002 United States  (Effective: 04-07-2022)
Prior: 814 N. Knowles Avenue, #211, New Richmond, WI 54017

INCLUDES: 22CF30, 22CF103 & 22CF115, 22CF139, & 22CF141 .

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

-  I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to submit to random drug testing random ETG testing at least 1 time per week.  If DE's case worker is willing to test her, case worker is to provide any miss testing or positive tests to JSC. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

 - It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Aaron K.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. THIS CONDITION SHALL ONLY BE EFFECTIVE UPON THE EXPIRATION OF A 72 HOUR NO CONTACT ORDER.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
Re: Defendant testing at DRC. Filed by J.S. SEALED. km      to js
Preliminary hearing on April 12, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

11:17 AM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, ADA: Brian Thomas Smestad via zoom, DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi, DF: Kristi Melinda David appeared. INCLUDES: 22CF30, 22CF103 & 22CF115- all set for PTC.  Court reviews files and notes motion to modify bond Atty Dolfi has filed.   ADA Smestad states he has sent a global offer to Atty Dolfi including the newest cases and states DE hasn't tested at the JSC since February.  Court will address 22CF139 (INIT) and 22CF141 (INIT).  On 22CF139-   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. On 22CF141-  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. Waives speedy trial.  Atty Dolfi would like to address the no contact on bond.  Court at this time will amend bond on all files.  Court requests Petition filed on 3/4/22 from case 22CM34 be copied over to these cases.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Initial appearance on April 12, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

09:55 AM  Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel ADA:  Brian Thomas Smestad   DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi   DF:  Kristi Melinda David appeared. INCLUDES 22CF103 (PH), 22CF115 (PH), 22CF139 (INIT) and 22CF141 (INIT). Atty Smestad states that Atty Dolfi would like to reset and states reasons, finds good cause to extend timelimits. Atty Smestad asks for DE to be ordered to test today as she has missed 4 tests accoring to JSC. Bond continues in form and amount, DE to test today. Court confirms address of DE. adjounred:  10:00 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Victim's Petition for Bond Modification filed by K.D. hml
